Module.Name: Soil concentration distributions
Module.Description: Soil concentration distributions are specified by a mean, cv and distribution type (lognormal). Specify the occurrence percentage as the percentage of samples that has positive concentrations.
Module.ShortDescription: Soil concentration distributions data are data on analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in soil samples.
Module.CalculationDescription: Soil concentration distributions are computed from soil concentrations data.
Module.DataDescription: Soil concentration distributions data can be entered using the internal, relational data format.
